resources.string: Before you can use the app, I have to download some data from our servers first. Please make sure you have a good network connection and press \"Next\" when ready.

The Blue Alliance for Android has been updated to a new version. I need to update some data from our servers before it\'s ready to use. Please make sure you have a good network connection and press \"Next\" when ready.
You\'re all set! Enjoy the app.

The Blue Alliance for Android includes a cloud-based feature called myTBA. myTBA allows you to keep track of your favorite aspects of the community. You can also add subscriptions to be notified when certain things happen at live events.\n Enabling myTBA requires you to grant access to your Google Account so we can make your favorite synchronize across your devices.
No internet connection was found. Check your connection and try again.
Your internet connection was interrupted. Check your connection and try again.
Well, this is really bad. We don\'t know what happened. If you want, you can contact the developer with the error code.
